GH-2187 code cleanup and turn temp test into proper test

timeline.bodyText: I would have been ok with you deleting this test, but it's nice of you to turn it into a functional test.
timeline.author: hmottestad

replies.bodyText: It's still a useful test to have in place, making sure that the expected explanation is actually produced.
replies.author: jeenbroekstra

timeline.bodyText: What was the reason you added this? Did you see any cycles in query plan?
timeline.author: hmottestad

replies.bodyText: This is something you added, I think. I assumed it was necessary, but was this part of the throwaway test code as well?
replies.author: jeenbroekstra

replies.bodyText: I intended for you to just revert my commits when you had figured out how to test the issue properly and how to fix it.
replies.author: hmottestad

replies.bodyText: I'll take it out. See, this is why I don't like throwaway code. It has a nast habit of sticking around.
replies.author: jeenbroekstra
